output:
God rest ye merry gentlemen, nothing you dismay
For Jesus Christ our Savior is born upon this day
To save us all from Satan's power and heal all the strays
Oh tidings of comfort and joy, comfort and joy
God a heavenly Father, blessed angel came
And unto certain shepherds brought tidings of the same
How that in Bethlehem was born the Son of God by name
Oh tidings of comfort and joy, comfort and joy
Shepherds at these tidings rejoiced much in mind
And left their flocks defeated in tempest, storm and wind
And went to Bethlehem straightway the blessed babe to find
Oh tidings of comfort and joy, comfort and joy
